thread.section_title: Trusted Translations, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trusted Translations, Inc. | www.trustedtranslations.com
thread.title: Trish B.
thread.title_full: Trusted Translations, Inc. reviewed by Trish B.

author: Trish B.
title: Trish B.
text: I have worked with Kevin from Trusted Translations twice now on projects. He is always pleasant, quick to answer questions, and offers prompt service. In fact, this time he was able to get me a turnaround in 24 hours! The materials look great. I will always go to Trusted Translations for future projects, and encourage others to do the same.
